page.title: 10CONSERVATION AREA DUNLOP
page.content: THE CONSERVATION AREA IN DUNLOP IS THE MAIN STREET. IT STARTS FROM THE TOP OF THE ROAD, UP AT THE CROSS, RIGHT DOWN TO THE BOTTOM OF THE STREET AT THE CHURCH. IF YOU WANT TO MAKE ANY KIND OF CHANGE TO THE FRONT OF YOUR BUILDING YOU HAVE TO APPLY FOR PERMISSION TO THE COUNCIL. SOMETIMES THEY CAN REFUSE WHAT YOU ASK FOR, BUT THEY USUALLY SAY YES. A WOMAN WHO HAS BOUGHT A HOUSE IN DUNLOP JUST RECENTLY, IS HAVING THE WHOLE OF THE HOUSE KNOCKED DOWN BUT SHE HAS TO LEAVE THE FRONT OF THE BUILDING ALONE AND MAKE SURE THERE ARE NO CHANGES MADE THERE, SO IN 100 YEARS TIME ALL THE FRONTS OF THE HOUSES WILL BE THE SAME AS THEY ARE AT THE MOMENT.
